@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mixin holding the handler for the two axis mouse wheel scrolling. Please keep in mind that the including widget has to have the scroll bars implemented as child controls named scrollbar-x and scrollbar-y to get the handler working. Also, you have to attach the listener yourself.
